Translations.Text: allaha balalenah tomara du'i upasya grahana karo na upasya to matra ekajana'i. Ata'eba amake'i bhaya kara.
Ya kichu nabhomandala o bhumandale ache ta tamra'i ebadata kara sasbata kartabya. Tomara ki allaha byatita ka'uke bhaya karabe
tomadera kache ye samasta neyamata ache, ta allahara'i paksa theke. Atahpara tomara yakhana duhkhe-kaste patita ha'o takhana tamra'i nikata kannakati kara.
Erapara yakhana allaha tomadera kasta duribhuta kare dena, takhana'i tomadera ekadala sbiya palanakartara sathe ansidara sabyasta karate thake.
Yate ai neyamata asbikara kare, ya ami taderake diyechi. Ata'eba maja bhoga kare na'o-satbara'i tomara janate parabe.

Tara amara deya jibanopakarana theke tadera jan'ye ekati ansa nirdharita kare, yadera kona khabara'i tara rakhe na. Allahara kasama, tomara ye apabada aropa karacha, se samparke abasya'i jijnasita habe.
Tara allahara jan'ye kan'ya santana nirdharana kare-tini pabitra mahimanbita ebam nijedera jan'ye ora ta'i sthira kare ya ora caya.
Yakhana tadera ka'uke kan'ya santanera susambada deya haya, takhana tara mukha kala haye yaya ebam asahya manastape klista hate thake.

Take sonano susambadera duhkhe se lokadera kacha theke mukha lukiye thake. Se bhabe, apamana sahya kare take thakate debe, na take matira nice pute phelabe. Sune rakha, tadera phayasala khuba'i nikrsta.
Yara parakala bisbasa kare na, tadera udaharana nikrsta ebam allahara udaharana'i mahana, tini parakramasali, prajnamaya.
